concept.title: For more information (topics)
concept.shortdesc: Additional sources of information for the topics section of this document.

prolog.author: Anna van Raaphorst
Richard Johnson
prolog.publisher: OASIS (Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards)

conbody.p: For a complete set of reference topics for DITA language elements, see the language reference document in the ditaot/demo directory.
